title: kenjin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Knowledge from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 

God Power: 「Blessing of Knowledge」

The chief librarian of the Heaven Library. The most well-informed God. Can use his God Power to easily absorb any kind of knowledge. So remember to check your mind as much as possible. 
Given gratutious Italian speech by translators which is suits him well. Open gerontophile. 

[i]Appearance:[/i] blond, slightly wild hair, blue eyes.
[i]Attire:[/i] dark-brown cloak with golden "wiki" brooch, white shirt, black pants and shoes. Small, tilted mortarboard on crown of the head.
[i]Accesories:[/i] glasses with circle rims, often seen with book in hands, always seen with stack of ramdom books on back. 
[i]Halo:[/i] left rim of his glasses. Can be used as flashlight.

title: henjin_(pageratta)
body:
The God(dess) of Change from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. Weird God(dess), Change[/tn]

God Power: 「Transformation」

The younger sister of the "Eccentric & Change" God entertainer duo.
Mainly specialize in acrobatic acts. Extremely shy. Only shows her brother her true form.
Only thing that supressing her extreme shyness in public is acting and so, she is always casually performing acrobatics and/or transformation even outside the stage.

[i]Appearance:[/i] long blue hair, red/blue heterochromia.
[i]Public attire:[/i] Clown's baggy full-body jumpsuit. Color: vertically divided in red and blue colors with white polka-dots. Jester cap has same coloring as suit but with interchanged red and blue color. Wears big round clown's head.
[i]Private attire:[/i]Red/blue fur-trimmed capelet, white gloves, white shirt with black sleeves, undefined black legwear.  
[i]Accesories:[/i] sometimes golden handbell used as brooch on capelet.
[i]Halo:[/i] slighly smaller than her shoulders, hangs on neck over chest.

title: kaijin_(pageratta)
body:
The Monster God from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]or just "Monster"[/tn]

God Power: 「Remodification」

A god who was born as the result of combining various experimental bodies together that Mad God has caught.
Has a kind-hearted personality, but is often misunderstood due to his appearance.
Rarely use his God Power.
Deserves his place in Heaven just by sheer amount of good karma points, one of most helpful gods in the pantheon. Interacts only with his crator, Mad God and never seen near other gods.

[i]Appearance:[/i] various body parts sewn together - blue head, yellow torso and right arm in one piece, brown feet and left arm, asymetrical "demon" wings - his left wing is bare-boned. Head: bald, without nose, ears and lips. Face: asymetrical eyes - one solid circle with red pupil, another is blank and half-open, scowl lines; ever open mouth with sharp teeth. Default expression is something between O_= and °Д°
[i]Attire:[/i] generic blue denim trousers with torn bottoms of pant-legs. Bandages: on right forearm, circular abdominal with single strap. Barefeet.
[i]Halo:[/i] pierces his head at temples and circles around occiput.

title: haijin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Decay from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. Cripple/Addict[/tn]

God Power: 「Dependency」

A PC addict, game addict, and a god who prefers to live in the virtual world.
Especially good at playing video game, no matter what genre.
Wears a visor that includes a headphone and special monitor necessary for his sights to work.
Rarely seen standing on his own feet.

[i]Appearance:[/i] has grey hair, pale skin. Comparing to the rest of pantheon he looks short and skinny. Looks being constantly underslept - bags under eyes, tired look. Eye color can't be defined because of visor.
[i]Attire:[/i] tan with green shades shirt and pants, brown slippers.
[i]Accesories:[/i] green visor with earphones, modern self-propelling wheelchair with white, green and black colors.
[i]Halo:[/i] small, vertically floats over left earphone.

title: gunjin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Military from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]].
[tn]a.k.a. "The Soldier"[/tn]
God Power: 「Subjugation」

The hot-blooded Offensive leader of the Angel Army. Graduated the same year as [[bujin_(pageratta)|Warrior God]]. Occasionally does battle with the Demon Army.
Stereotypical, but [i]true[/i] drill sergeant - while he mixing with dirt anyone by shouting at them, he actually does care about them. Often challenging [[bujin_(pageratta)|Warrior God]] in various matters.

[i]Appearance:[/i] [[light_brown_hair|Light brown hair]]. A fresh looking scar under left eye. Often seen with [[anger_vein|anger vein]] Constricted pupils.
[i]Attire:[/i] Typical soldier single-colored uniform - green shirt, pants and helmet. Black boots and gloves. Tank top under shirt. White belt over shirt with pouches on sides.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Three medals on left side of chest. Often seen with cigar, lit up or not. 
[i]Halo:[/i] diagonal hula-loop around torso, resembling [[sam_browne_belt|sam browne belt]].

title: thochan
body:
[b]Thochan[/b] is one of the [[NChans]] characters. She is special since she is a doll, not a humain. She is a living doll meaning she is "alive". She doesn't need to eat or drink, however she can properly move and must be away from water and fire. Kaochan protects her as her mother.

[b]See also[/b]
* [[NChans]]
* [[Kaochan]]

title: kaochan
body:
[b]Kaochan[/b] is one of the [[NChans]] characters. She can be scary but in normal times you're safe, due to a serious accident she is not very intelligent. She is very possessive and hates that someone touches Thochan. Apart from her hostess job, she hunts ghosts. Her chinese dress is always torn. She can be naked without knowing it.

[b]See also[/b]
* [[NChans]]
* [[Thochan]]

title: doujin_(pageratta)
body:
The Doujin God from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]].

God Power: 「Moenization」

Originally a human who was so extremely Otaku-ish, that he became a god in the end.
Still fairly new to being a god. Most comprehensive in Otaku-related things such as Photography, Figurines and Illustration.
[[Chuunibyou]]: refers to himself in third-person ("this one"), doing poses when enters into scene or when uses his god power.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Has short black hair, constricted pupils to dots.
[i]Attire:[/i] Red sports jacket with yellow collar, black pants, red sneakers. Black fingerless gloves.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Red and yellow flame-styled hachimaki. Rectangular glasses. Huge yellow backpack.
[i]Halo:[/i] used as belt for pants.

[spoiler] Being worshipped by local otakus - read comments under posts with him. [/spoiler]

title: choujin_(pageratta)
body:
The Super God from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]].
[tn]a.k.a. "The Almighty"[/tn]

God power: 「Transcendence」

The one and only Super God, the most powerful god in heaven. The world would be in trouble if he used his true power.
Walking manifestation of "Mundane made Awesome". Uses his god power for god-tier show-off and/or trolling. Every thing he own has prefix "super". 

[i]Appearance:[/i] long white hair, dark grey eyes. Eyes are always half-open.
[i]Attire:[/i] White ankle-long both chiton and cape. Golden pauldrons and sandals. Two thorny vines used as belt with two (red and blue) roses on sides.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Sun with eight rays attached to forehead with writing "super" on it. Golden thin bracelets. Golden collar with red gem.
[i]Halo:[/i] Wide hula-loop, that hovers vertically with center behind shoulders.

title: bujin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of War from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]].

God Power: 「Call to Arms」

Defensive Leader of the Angel Army. Rose from the rank of an Angel soldier to God.
Main duties are to protect Heaven from the Demon Army and maintain security within Heaven. One of the best fighting forces in Heaven. 
Has rather fatherly attitude towards subordinates. Accepts every challenge.
Pachinko addict.

[i]Appearance and attire:[/i] wears full-body plate armor over black sleeveless turtleneck and pants, long red cape. Never seen without helmet, it has attached wings over ears and red mohawk, [spoiler]which is his hair.[/spoiler] 
[i]Accesories:[/i] Carries long sword and small round shield. 
[i]Halo:[/i] is on the rim of the shield.

title: bonjin_(pageratta)
body:
The Common God from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]].
[tn]For readers' convenience named as "Demigod".[/tn]

God Power: 「Blessing of individuality」

The Serious Beginner God. A former mortal with life so normal, that he ascended to godhood. Most common character in series. Favorite food is "Bon curry (Mild)":[http://www.boncurry.jp]. Values his vintage jeans.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Has short black hair, brown eyes, laurel crown in hair on sides. Has distinctively muscular physique.
[i]Attire:[/i] Wears common white chiton with belt over it, common blue vintage jeans, common brown boots. 
[i]Accesories:[/i] golden brooch and belt's clasp stylised as "凡" ("Normal"), conventional golden vambraces, ordinary round pendant.
[i]Halo:[/i] typical horizontal ring above head.
[spoiler]
[i]Laurel Crown:[/i] can be considered his secondary God Power. It grows from his scalp. Grants him passive protection from God Power of some other gods by taking direct hit. With training can be aquired other uses. Also it's leaves can be used to brew godly deicious tea. 
[/spoiler]

title: banjin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Impurity (Savage) from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 

God Power: 「Impurity」

One of the "Three Rebel Gods", the "Neutral Evil" of the trio.
A god who likes to be dirty and the impure more than anything. Never entered a bath even once during his life as a mortal. Can make the whole heaven literally hold its nose. Usually seen eating junk food for the sake of littering. 

[i]Appearance:[/i] Has [[green hair]], [[red eyes]]. 
[i]Attire:[/i] resemble French soldier uniform from Imperial Era (1600s - 1800s): [[bicorne]], coat with [[epaulettes]], white pants with patch on knee, brown shoes on bare feet. Clothes are torn and filthy.
[i]Halo:[/i] The [[nose ring]].

title: kijin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Eccentricity from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "Eccentric god"[/tn]

God Power: "Teleportation"

The older brother of the "Eccentric & Change" God entertainer duo.
A highly respectable magician, has the skill to perform even the most difficult close-up magic tricks, but rarely managed to display his skill, due to his lack of flashiness.
While being used to teleporting things inside-outside on stage, sometimes his God Power works not as intented when the situation calls. Don't bother him on a whim, because he is, well... eccentric.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Combed back blue hair, blue-red heterochromia. Usually wears wide scenic smile.
[i]Attire:[/i] Black tuxedo, dark red vest, white shirt, bolo tie with round blue clasp, white gloves, top hat.
[i]Accesories:[/i] cane, which is usually seen on his stage pefromances. White half mask over "blue" eye with golden brow and eye rim, never takes it off. 
[i]Halo:[/i] Golden ring on his top hat resting on brim. Without hat - typical overhead.

title: shijin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Poetry from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "Poet"[/tn]

God Power: 「Blessing of Emotion」

A goddess who like to travel and wander.
Just because she's always greedy for money, doesn't mean that she's poor, she's just a pennypincher. What she does with the money she's saved up is a mystery.
Combination of Poet's greed and God Power makes her a perfect scammer, but she'd rather bother to make conditions to sell obvious junk for a single use than steal money with more direct apprioach. If a money not involved she can use her God Power for all she want.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Orange short hair and eyes. Thin lest sidelock is always outside of cloak.
[i]Attire:[/i] Gives her her androgynous look. Brown witch hat, cloak, gloves and boots. Cloak buttoned behind shoulder. Ambiguous shirt - either green with white sleeves or white with green vest. Shirt has golden triangle buttons. Dark green pants.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Lute, either in hands or on back. White paper sheets under cloak. White cartoon wing, attached to halo and holding it on hat. 
[i]Halo:[/i] Attached to hat at bottom, but not resting on brim.

title: bikini_jeans
body:
A form of [[lowleg pants|low-riding]] [[jeans]] with a fabric strip [i]resembling[/i] [[side-tie panties]] sticking out the top.

These jeans were designed by Tanimura Sandra and produced and sold by Sanna's Brazilian Fashion, a Japanese clothing company.  The design is supposedly made in response to requests to make pants that are even lower, but resolve the problem of keeping them up.

Do not add the [[side-tie panties]] tag if it's of the same material as the pants.

title: aijin_(pageratta)
body:
The Goddess of Love from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 

God Power: 「Blessing of Love」

The Goddess who oversees the Cupids. Likes to make couples. Has a pair of detachable harp-shaped [[wings]]. Can use them to sing very good love songs.
She forbids any coupling involved herself, except coupling her and Demigod's opinion about foodstuff. Also said love for food nets her worries about own figure. Sometimes Love Goddess hang out at Heaven's training grounds for shipping The Warrior and The Soldier.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Has [[long_hair|long]], [[pink_hair]] and [[pink_eyes]]. Eyes often depicted with [[heart-shaped pupils]]. 
[i]Attire:[/i] Pink [[strapless dress]] with heart-shaped chest and frontal slit, revealing white [[short shorts]]. Crosslaces on shins and forearms. Barefeet.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Usually wears a [[necklace]] with a [[heart-shaped pendant]] on it. Heart-shaped hair accesory over left temple.
[i]Halo:[/i] Shoulder-wide [[hula loop]] at waist level.

title: youjin_(pageratta)
body:
The Goddess of Authority from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "VIP Goddess"[/tn]

God Power: “Amelioration”

[code]

<<   The perfect is an enemy of the good.   >>

[/code]

The Goddess in charge of managing Heaven.
Always changing Heaven's policies and directions on behalf of the Almighty at a dizzying pace. For that reason, the Demons especially see her as an enemy.
A true celebrity.
Often willing to grant her blessing for stuff, but outcome can either defeating the purpose thing or becomes outright useless with a rare chance to proc a critical success. It's unusual to see her without bodyguards.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Generally she looks like the "bright young thing" - an early teenager with too much wealth. Bears true Aryan look - long blonde hair with sidelocks, blue eyes, skin shades are lighter than others. 
[i]Attire:[/i] Simple one-piece dress with slight gradient from top purple to pinkish purple bottom. Wide sleeves with white frills, bottom has three rows of frills, popped collar.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Fur-trimmed lavender folding fan with "VIP" on it. Circlet with large red gem on forehead. Golden chain necklace either with same red gem or smaller rainbow colored jewels. 
[i]Halo:[/i] Hoola-loop that float at ankle level, just above bottom frills.

title: tatsujin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Skills from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "The Master", "Skillestial", "All-Star God", "God of Skills", "G.O.A.T."[/tn]

God Power: 「Mastering」

The strongest officer in the Heaven's army. 
Skilled in every form of martial arts (and every other kind of arts) in existence. An extremely strong god, only second to The Almighty. Also, he's an old friend of The Almighty. Mentor to The Warrior God.
Although he can master any skill with his God Power, he prefers to gain it hard way. His choice to learn next skill even more random than the randomest number generator in existence and execution is as unexpected as the infamous spanish inqusition. 

[i]Appearance:[/i] Generally japanese style with purple and white color scheme. Long purple hair, tied in low ponytail. Purple eye. "Resting Asshole's Face": lip corners bent downwards, brows are tilted upwards, always serious and never smiles. Has [[irezumi]] in left shoulder. Usually seen with hands in sleeves.
[i]Attire:[/i] White kimono shirt. Purple hakama, geta. 
[i]Accesories:[/i] Eyepatch over right eye with "達" on it, occasionally wooden sword hanging on belt, hip covers on sides.
[i]Halo:[/i] Used to tie his hair.

title: roujin_(pageratta)
body:
The Elder God from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "The Hermit God"[/tn]

God Power: 「Aging」

The Hermit God who lives on the Mountain of Heaven. Know a lot of things since he's been living in Heaven since ancient times.
Wisdom God's mentor, but ironically he has totally opposite tastes - prefers young girls. 
The Hermit may be old by looks, but he is young at heart and behave accordingly to an "old pervert" stereotype. 
Has the ability "[[flying nimbus]]", but that's rather due to relationship with sentinent cloud named "Cloudia", which has shape-shifting ability itself. Also can temporary rejuvenate himself into muscular macho.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Short, old man. White hair, long goatee past his waist. Mostly bald, except the top of head. Eyes squited to dots because of his old age. Thick triangle brows.

title: scorpion_(karmatron)
body:
A combat giant [[alien]] [[robot]] from the [[Karmatron y los Transformables]] franchise.

[b]Scorpion[/b] was the first Cybernetic Gladiator from planet [[Metnal]] created for the sole purpose of destroying [[Karmatron]]. 

It was designed by a Metnalite scientist called [[Garkoz]]. Scorpion is a "robot-ship" and has a cockpit in its head unit with capacity for a crew of Metnalite soldiers and their leaders. 

The purple and yellow robot can shoot laser rays, megatonic rays and feiser rays. It also can use its [[scorpion tail]] as a weapon and inject lethal energy known as "ionic poison" with it. It possess a potent deflection shield and is extremely strong.

Scorpion is 300 feet tall and does not possess variable geometry.

body:
The Goddess of Renewal from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "New(bie) Goddess"[/tn]

God Power: 「Renewal」

The Neophile Goddess. 
She's a veteran god who's always feeling like a NEW rookie. 
Like to buy every new thing in existence so she has to always do a variety of part-time jobs in order to keep buying new stuff. However, once she get familiar with the work, she quits. 
"Old" and it's synonyms hits her [s]health[/s]mood bar. You can stun-lock her with mix and match "old" and "new" words. If one wants to pull off "brutality" finisher on her - dial this combo: "Classic poetry - New Collection of Poems Ancient and Modern. This is used, but still New edition". 

[i]Appearance:[/i] Light blue hair, tied in twintails. Eye color match that of hair. She is noticeably short, compared to rest of the pantheon, making her look like high-schooler/student. "Waa~" and "Hawawa~" as verbal tic. 
[i]Attire:[/i] Generally resemble dress-code of low-ranked employee at super-market or cafe. Orange t-shirt, white short pleated skirt, black {{kneehighs}}, either light-brown or white boots.
[i]Accesories:[/i] except golden stars, are red - visor cap and waist bag with word "NEW" on them, wristwatch on right wrist. One star in a pendant, other two are on boots' laces.
[i]Halo:[/i] Typical overhead.

title: falchion_(weapon)
body:
tl;dr A European medieval sword, but with one edge instead of two.

The English ”falchion” is derived from the French ”Fauchon”, spelled as ”fawchon” in late 14th C texts. Behind these names lies the Latin ”Falxs,” describing weapons with scythe-like blades. 

Falchion blades are typically rather short and broaden towards the point with the edge in a more or less sweeping curve. The hilt usually follows the popular styles as seen on double edged swords of the same period. 

Two general shapes are predominant: 

1. The first is curved more or less like a saber usually with a short clip point.
2. The second has a straight back with or without clip point, and a curving edge.

h4.See also

* [[falchion]] (disambiguation page)

[code]
 <<   - It seems like thoughout the series, the God of Friendships got screw over a lot.

The Super Friendly God, can become friends with anyone without discrimination. Secretly worries about balding. Ascended to godhood due to sheer numbers of "Like!" at FaceBook.

body:
The God of Death from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "The Killer"[/tn]

God Power: 「Blessing of Death」

One of the three rebel gods, the "Lawful Evil" one.
Has the obligation to kill one person a day. Used to be one of the best hitmen when he was a mortal.
A very methodical & fastidious man. And although he is the total opposite of [[banjin_(pageratta)|The Impurity God,]] they are totally in sync.
Has "god-tier" for his both "OCD" and "clean freak".
The Killer can enchant his weapon and bullets with his power, but he still must hit the target... while sitting as high as Heaven. (see post #1910096)

[i]Appearance:[/i] "Resting Asshole Face" - heavy chin, scowl lines, corners of lips bent down. Slicked down black hair.
[i]Attire:[/i] is mostly black - trench coat, pin-stripe suit, gloves, shoes. Red shirt, yellow necktie.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Rectangular sunglasses, carries black gun bag over shoulder. Single-shot sniper rifle, silenced pistol.

[code]
<< The road to hell is paved with good intentions. >>
[/code]
The most good hearted goddess in Heaven. Carer of the Heaven's children. Curer of man's illnesses. Still has strong faith in God, despite being a God herself.
She is helping first, thinking later - that strong desire to help often puts her into undesirable situations, contradictions and even helping obviously wrong people.

[i]Attire:[/i] Common nun set - habit, white capelet, open black cassock with white undergarment.

body:

[tn]a.k.a. "Insane/Mad God, Madman.". Do not confuse with clowness "Weird Goddess" (translation of name) and the giant "Titan" ("kyou-" vs. "kyo-").[/tn]

God Power: 「Curse of Insanity」

One of the rebel gods who set up his laboratory inside the cloud of Heaven.
Likes to catch living creatures to perform experiments and researches on them without regard for anyone. 
In short, a MAD SCIENTIST.
He is "father" to [[kaijin_(pageratta)|The Monster]], [[tetsujin_(pageratta)|The Robot]] and... creature mix which  is resembling something between hydra (5-headed) and chimera (mix of 5 animals). Got barelly readable insane speech pattern which include mix of upper- and lowercases, stutter, randomly typed letters, random symbols. Often seen facepalming. 
The "Chaotic Evil" of the Rebel trio.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Pink uncombed hair, pink constricted pupils, wears wide open smile because often do "mad laugh" with saliva.
[i]Attire:[/i] White lab coat, pink shirt, black trousers, dark red shoes.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Golden necklace chain.
[i]Halo:[/i] Tilted and dislocated, usually over right side of head.

title: miriam_defensor_santiago
body:
Miriam Defensor Santiago (1945-2016) was a former Philippine Senator, known for her fiery rhetoric and nigh incorruptible tenure in all positions she held in the Philippine government. She is best known for the monicker "The Iron Lady of Asia" and claims to "eat death threats for breakfast."

Due to her warming up with [[Rodrigo Duterte]] during the Philippine Presidential Elections of 2016, both of which were candidates for president those times, she became paired with him in every fanworks, creating the so-called 'Duriam' pairing that became popular within the country.

She died in her sleep on September 29, 2016 battling lung cancer, an ailment she claimed to have overcome during the presidential campaign.

title: kriegsmesser
body:
The great combat knife has had a long tradition in Europe. Beginning in the Seax and single-edged Germanic swords of the Iron Age, a weapon with a big cutting blade mounted as a knife was celebrating a popularity as a functional and no-nonsense sidearm of warriors and civilians alike through the ages.

In German speaking areas, the Falchion did not reach the same popularity as elsewhere in Europe. Instead the big war-knife saw a development of its own. 

These come in many forms and sizes, some more intended for stabbing, others for cutting and yet other types that combined cutting and thrusting capability. We know them today by different names: Rugger (a long, stiff and pointy variant, primarily meant for stabbing), Hauswher (peasant knife; an intimidating weapon of defense), Grossemesser /Messer (literally: big knife/knife, a single handed weapon with a wide cutting blade with the dimensions of a short sword, popular among commoners, nobles, civilians and soldiers alike) and Kriegsmesser (war-knife of hand-and-a-half or even two-hand size. A weapon for the professional soldier that also saw use among civilians).

title: genjin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Primitivity from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "Primitive/wild god"[/tn]

God Power: "Feralization" 

Is said to be the first God that was ever born. Although he doesn't have many memories of his past, because he thinks looking back to the past is not WILD.
Always trying to do things in a wild way. Given full-caps speech by translators to emphasize his wild nature.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Overall has brown color scheme for hair and attire. Muscular, has bushy chest body hair. Shoulder-long wild hair. Always scowling, constricted puplis.
[i]Attire:[/i] wears white saber-tooth skull of undefined animal as headwear, chiton made of fur, barefeet but wears shin guards.
[i]Accesories:[/i] fang necklace with 3 fangs, stone axe/hammer.  
[i]Halo:[/i] vertical, on left shoulder, "lower" side is closer to armpit than "upper" side.

title: mujin_(pageratta)
body:
The God of Nothingness from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 

God Power : "Erasion"

A God who was born from nothingness. Nothing much to be said about him, particularly.
Occasionally being ignored by others. Always refers to himself as "me". Quite cheerful, considering his situation. 

[i]Appearance:[/i] Transparent sihlouette without distinctive features except for head and palms. Palms has distinctive fingers. Head has visible mouth and ears. Wears wide, open smile. 
[i]Halo:[/i] Horisontal, overhead, wider than his shoulders.

title: arisawa_tatsuki
body:
A tomboyish karate practitioner with dreams of becoming a vale tudo champion, Tatsuki seems to possess no excessively feminine qualities as is typical of female manga characters. However, she does spell her name using hiragana (たつき), which she thinks looks feminine, because she thinks the kanji of her name looks un-cute.

She is protective of Orihime because men looking for a date—to say nothing of Chizuru Honshō, the school lesbian—often approach Orihime. She is an expert martial artist that places high in Japan's national karate competitions, coming in second in her age group even though she had a broken arm at the time. In addition, she has also tutored Orihime in karate.

title: unity_(game_engine)
body:
A 2d & 3d game engine made by Unity Technologies.

It's designed for extensive scalability with support for all major platforms, meaning it's possible (within a reasonable limit) for the same game to be run on Mobile, Consoles and PCs. Games are usually coded in C#, although JavaScript is also supported.

It's scalability, along with extensive documentation and relative ease of use makes it [i]the[/i] most used engine in the market.

Note that this tag is used mostly by Unity-chan (Real Name: [[Ootori Kohaku]]), the mascot character created by Unity Technologies Japan to represent the engine.

title: working!!_(web_manga)
body:
Working!! is a web comic written and illustrated by [[Takatsu Karino]], which she published in irregular intervals on her personal website since 2002. It is the origins of the serialized version of [[Working!!]] in the Square Enix's Young Gangan manga.

The web comic's setting and characters are different from the later four-panel comic strip manga. While the restaurant in the web comic and manga are both called Wagnaria, they are different branch stores, so the world is the same. For example, [[Sakaki Kenichirou]], the web comic's store manager, is an old friend of [[Shirafuji Kyouko]] and [[Adachi Masahiro]] from the web comic is a band mate of [[Satou Jun]] from the Young Gangan version. The author called the web comic version [i]Neko-gumi[/i] (猫組 - Cat Group) and the serialized manga version [i]Inu-gumi[/i] (犬組 - Dog Group).

On April 2nd, 2016 an anime adaptation titled [i]WWW.WORKING[/i] was announced to be in the works.

h4. Characters

title: wargreymon
body:
The Ultimate-level evolution of [[Agumon]]. War Greymon is a Dragon Man Digimon, and one of the various Ultimates among Greymon-species. It is equipped with its [i]Dramon Killers[/i] on its arms, which allow it to effectively slay Dramon-type Digimon, and the [i]Brave Shield[/i] on its back, which bears the [i]Crest of Courage[/i] and can deflect any attack.
Its special move is gathering energy from the atmosphere and firing it as a huge, densely concentrated orb ([b]Gaia Force[/b]).

War Greymon most commonly evolves from [[metalgreymon|Metal Greymon]]. Its counterpart is [[metalgarurumon|Metal Garurumon]]. Together, the two can Jogress Evolve into [[Omegamon]].

In [[Digimon Adventure]], War Greymon is the Partner Digimon of [[Yagami Taichi]].

title: taishou_yakyuu_musume
body:
(Taishou Baseball Girls)

A light novel series, with anime and manga adaptions, by  Kagurasaka Atsushi, with illustrations by [[Koike Sadaji]], about a group of middle school girls in Japan during 1925 who form a baseball team at their school.  

The series is about them overcoming the challenges they face starting as a team of novices working to be able to compete on a equal footing against experienced teams while also facing discrimination for being women playing a "man's sport."

title: futokoro_haitte_ii?
body:
ねえ、懐、入っていい?

A phrase said by [[Shinano Toushirou]] from [[Touken Ranbu]]. 

It translates as "Can I stay close to you?", but literally it means "Can I be in your bosom?".

Shinano has a fixation on being physically close to the Saniwa more so than other swords. This is because of how tantou swords were carried close to their owner's chest, and Shinano was regarded more as a treasure than a weapon. Of course, fans like to joke with the phrase, since the more literal translation of it sounds sexually suggestive.

title: ladies'_code
body:
A Korean K-Pop girl group signed to [[Polaris Entertainment]]. Since their debut in 2013, their hits include [i]Pretty Pretty[/i], [i]So Wonderful[/i] and [i]Galaxy[/i]. 

On September 3rd, 2014, tragedy struck the group when a van carrying the group crashed late at night while speeding. EunB died at the scene, while RiSe passed away four days later, with both deaths sparking a worldwide outpouring of grief and support from fans. In 2016, after almost a year and a half of hiatus, Ladies' Code successfully returned as a trio composed of its surviving members.

Their members are:

[b]Current[/b]
* Ashley (Choi Bina/Ashley Choi), AKA Global Code
* Sojung (Lee Sojung), AKA Funky Code
* Zuny (Kim Joomi), AKA Pretty Chic Code

[b]Former (deceased)[/b]
* [[Go Eunbi|EunB (Go Eunbi), AKA Lovely Code]]
* [[Kwon Rise|RiSe (Kwon Rise), AKA Pure Code]]

title: volt_x-5
body:
A sentient combat giant [[insectoid]] [[alien]] [[robot]] from the [[Karmatron y los Transformables]] franchise.

[b]Volt X-5[/b] is a Cybernetic Gladiator from planet [[Krall]] created for the sole purpose of destroying [[Karmatron]]. 

Unlike most Cybernetic Gladiators, this giant and green insectoid [[mecha]] wasn't designed by [[Garkoz]]. It was built by the Kralloks from planetoid Krall under the leadership of [[Procum]].

The robot is 300 feet tall and does not possess variable geometry.

title: die_sendung_mit_der_maus
body:
Die Sendung mit der Maus (The Show with the Mouse) is a highly acclaimed children's series on German television that has been called "the school of the nation".

Although the program was initially condemned by teachers and childcare professionals as bad for children's development, it is now hailed for its ability to convey information to children and has received over 75 awards.

h4.See also

* Wikipedia article (EN): "Die Sendung mit der Maus":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Die_Sendung_mit_der_Maus]

title: nishikawa_youko
body:
A former Ojou-sama from [[Sansha San'you]] with [[long hair|long]] [[purple hair]] and [[purple eyes]]. She is usually depicted in her [[school uniform]] - a [[serafuku]] with a cream coloured top and [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[brown skirt]].

Most of her diet consists of [[bread crust|bread crusts]].

Youko is good friends with [[Odagiri Futaba]] and [[Hayama Teru]] and is often followed around by her former butler [[Yamaji Mitsugu]].

title: type_95_reconnaissance_car
body:
[quote]
九五式小型乗用車 ("kyuujitai":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ky%C5%ABjitai]: 九五式小型乘用車): きゅうごしきこがたじょうようしゃ (Kyuugo-shiki Kogata Jouyousha)
[/quote]

[[Imperial Japanese Army]]'s small four-wheel drive vehicle manufactured by  "Nihon Nainenki":[https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E5%86%85%E7%87%83%E6%A9%9F] between 1937 and 1945. Its nickname was "[i]Kurogane Yonki[/i]" (Kurogane 4WD).
Note that its Japanese official name does not contain the term "reconnaissance".

h4.See also

title: kyojin_(pageratta)
body:
The Giant God from "Everyday with Gods":/pools/8741 series by [[pageratta]]. 
[tn]a.k.a. "Titan"[/tn]

God power: 「Enlargement」

The 2-meter tall God. Because of his large physique, his brain is rather small. 
Originally a Golem who was made to serve the other gods.
Despite being obviously dumb, sometimes Titan drops sparks of wisdom. As former servant he often lend a clumsy hand with his God Power and involved in teamwork with other gods, including amplifying others' God Power with his own.

[i]Appearance:[/i] Tall, dark skinned. Always wears "dumb smile", sometimes with saliva. Dark red messy mohawk. Constricted pupils to dots, usually with "strabismus":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strabismus when his sight is not focused. Huge cross-shaped scar on chest.
[i]Attire:[/i] Black bike shorts and boots, white cloth used as an "ass apron" and suspended on waist by belt.
[i]Accesories:[/i] Black wristbands with orange "G" on them. Also, same "G" stylized as golden buckle. 
[i]Halo[/i]: Hanging on left ear as small earring on short chain.

title: 10_times_quiz
body:
A game where someone is asked to say a word 10 times (usually [i]piza[/i] "pizza"), and then asked a question (usually "What is this?" while pointing to the questioner's elbow). The idea is that repeating the first word should cause the person to say another word that sounds similar ([i]hiza[/i] "knee") instead of the correct word ([i]hiji[/i] "elbow").

Also called [b]10 times game[/b] (10回ゲーム).

title: momodora:_reverie_under_the_moonlight
body:
Momodora: Reverie Under the Moonlight explores a cursed land in decline. Evil spreads, the dead rise, and corruption reigns. Hope is but a faded memory for all but one, a priestess named Kaho from the village of Lun. An audience with her majesty, the queen, would surely save the land--but time is short and each night darker than the last. 

Reverie Under the Moonlight is the fourth entry in the Momodora series, a side-scrolling platformer focused on action gameplay, with melee combos, dodge mechanics and a plethora of items and spells to unleash upon your enemies. Play casually for the rich setting and mysterious story or crank up the difficulty to run your reflexes through a truly brutal gauntlet.

h4. External links

* "Official site":[http://bombservice.com/presskit/projects/momo4/]

title: kamisama_drop
body:
[i](from BakaUpdates)[/i]

17-year-old Nowaki Asunaro has been forsaken by fortune since his birth. Every step he takes, bad luck awaits, whether it takes the shape of a falling bucket of water on his head or being blamed for crimes he never committed. Even for an exceptionally unlucky fellow like him, he still hopes to become friends with the love of his life: Hashihime Banri. The only problem lies in the fact that every time he almost gets close to her, his lack of luck blocks the way.

On one typical day for him, filled with unfortunate accidents, he ends up having to protect himself from the rain in a forsaken and dilapidated temple. He becomes feverish from cold and hunger, but in desperation, he prays to the gods that he survive this day and become friends with Banri. Lo and behold, it seems like he accidentally summoned a God(?). Will this accident bring him the luck he never had?

title: shouwa_ahozoushi_akanuke_ichiban!
body:
A 1985~1987 shoujo gag manga series by [[Azuki Yuu]]. It has a 1985~1986 anime adaptation.

Per AniDB: "Koujirou moves to Tokyo from Japan's northernmost island of Hokkaido and insists on bringing his favourite horse, Hikarikin, with him. The alien king Rel arrives from planet Wedelun and gives him a belt that will allow him to transform into a Miracle Hero and to protect the world from alien menaces. He is more interested, however, in impressing the pretty Yuka, though his rival, Michinari, wants her for himself."

h4.See also

* "Wikipedia article (JP)":[https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%98%AD%E5%92%8C%E3%82%A2%E3%83%9B%E8%8D%89%E7%B4%99%E3%81%82%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AC%E3%81%91%E4%B8%80%E7%95%AA!]

title: paschal_candle
body:
A religious white candle important for some variants of Christianity (such as catholicism).

h6. Characteristics
* A cross ([[latin cross]]) is printed on it.
* Has five dots (grains of incense) representing Jesus' wounds.
* The [[greek letter|greek letters]] alpha and omega are present.
* It should be bigger than other candles and be placed in a central location.

title: yuki_no_shingun
body:
(Snowy March)

A Japanese military song written & composed by "Nagai Kenshi":[https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B0%B8%E4%BA%95%E5%BB%BA%E5%AD%90] in 1895. The song was forbbiden during the [[World War II]] due to its depressing, almost antiwar, lyrics.

The song was used in Moritani Shirou's 1977 film "Mt. Hakkouda":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mount_Hakkoda_(1977_film)] and the TV episode 9 & OVA episode 5 of [[Girls und Panzer]].

title: nikka_edvardine_katajainen
body:
Nikka Edvardine Katajainen (ニッカ・エドワーディン・カタヤイネン ?) is a witch of the [[502nd Joint Fighter Wing]], originating from [[Suomus]]. She is referred to as "Nipa" by her friends. Her familiar is the Ermine.

Nikka is affiliated with No.24 Squadron, an elite unit of the Suomus Air Force. As [[Eila Ilmatar Juutilainen]] is also a member of this squadron, the two are fellow squadron members.

Nikka is something of a tomboy, bearing a boyish appearance and often unladylike manner. She was once something of a delinquent, which has since eased somewhat with the influence of her close friends such as Eila and [[Hanna Wind]]. She possesses a very exacting personality which usually splits any situation into right or wrong. While not stupid, she is relatively guileless and often distracted, making her a popular subject for Eila's pranks.

Nikka is based on the Finnish flying ace Nils Katajainen (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nils_Katajainen ). Like Nikka, Nils had a reputation for frequently crashing his craft, often surviving with only minor injuries. Her nickname, "Nipa," was also Nils' nickname during the war.
other_names: ニッカ・エドワーディン・カタヤイネン

title: edytha_rossmann
body:
Edytha Roßmann (エディータ・ロスマン?) is a veteran witch of the [[502nd Joint Fighter Wing]], originating from Karlsland. Her familiar is the [[fox]].

A girl with a cheerful sort of "face forward" personality, her fighting style is the very essence of cleverness. Because her body can't handle the high-speed maneuvers of dog fighting for an extended period of time it was necessary for her to learn a style that married careful observation of the target to a single decisive blow and follow-through escape. This talent has lead to her being a valued instructor and strategist despite a low confirmed kill count.

Possibly metaphorical, references are made to her "true form" surfacing, as if she never developed her condition. Part of this form is her familiar upgrading to the [[kyuubi]], or nine-tailed, ascendant spirit foxes of Japanese mythology.

Her Pilot archetype is Edmund Roßmann. According to her profile in SWII Vol. 3's booklet, her nickname "Paula" is based on the Latin "Paulus," meaning "small." (This also parallels Edmund Roßmann's nickname of "Paule," a male variant.)
other_names: エディータ・ロスマン

title: hmas_australia_(i84)
body:
HMAS Australia (I 84 / D 84 / C 01) was a County class (Kent sub class) heavy cruiser built in the United Kingdom for the Royal Australian Navy and completed in 1928.

She saw active service in the Pacific War through multiple major battles of the war. Australia was decommissioned in 1954 and sold for scrap.

title: ginkou_no_reiter_crois
body:
Ginkou no Kishi Kunshou (furigana: Ginkou no Reiter Crois) Lit. Sparkling Silver Knight Medal is a Japanese light novel series written by Kawaguchi Tsukasa and illustrated by Shibakura Noan. It was published by Kadokawa's Fujimi Fantasia Bunko between 2007 to 2008 with the title Reiter Crois and has been collected in five volumes. Starting from May 2014 the series is republished by Ichijinsha and illustrated by Asio.

h4. See Also

* "Official Novel Page (Ichijinsha Version)":http://www.ichijinsha.co.jp/novel/2014/07/28/%E9%8A%80%E7%85%8C%E3%81%AE%E9%A8%8E%E5%A3%AB%E5%8B%B2%E7%AB%A0%E3%80%88%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%82%BF%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AD%E3%82%A4%E3%82%B9%E3%80%89%EF%BC%91-2/

title: the_girl_and_the_robot
body:
[b]The Girl and the Robot[/b] is a third-person action/adventure game by [i]Flying Carpets Games[/i] (character design by [[monaka_(siromona)|Monaka]]).

A [[the_girl_(gnr)|girl]] trapped in a lifeless castle built upon ancient arcane technology, and ruled by an [[the_evil_queen_(gnr)|evil queen]]. One fateful day, she escapes her prison cell and encounters a malfunctioning [[the_robot_(gnr)|robot knight]] that she decides to free. They must work together to unravel the mystery of the castle in time to escape with their lives.

h4. External links

* "Official Website":https://flyingcarpetsgames.com/
* "Kickstarter campaign":https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2039811773/the-girl-and-the-robot

title: mat
body:
A padded piece of fabric used to cushion a person. Commonly used in sports like [[gymnastics|gymnastics]] to suppress the impact of a person during falls.

For inflatable mattresses used as a bed or at [[soapland|soapland]] houses for massages, see [[air_mattress|air mattress]]. For inflatable mattresses used in the water, see [[inflatable_raft|inflatable raft]]. For floor mattresses used as a bed, see [[futon|futon]]. For colorful mats used on the beach for sunbathing, see [[beach_towel|beach towel]]. For small mats used to wipe shoes and feet, see [[doormat|doormat]] or [[rug|rug]].

h4. See also

In Ghostrick Live, she plays a more central role.

title: g3a3_(upotte!!)
body:
Upotte's portrayal of the G3A3 German diesel-age batter rifle. 

Known as "Jiisuri" (a mispronounced interpretation of G3).

Jiisuri is tall, black haired, and usually drawn with brown or greyed eyes. She is moderately busty but wears tight clothing that hides this; a reference to the G3's slim but heavy handgaurd. Unlike most of the other students at her academy, she wears an entirely black and grey uniform except for a large red bow placed on her breast (a reference to the G3's all black finish). She (and her sisters) are also one of the only characters in Upotte to wear pantyhose, a reference to her fairly unique looking plastic stock. 

Jiisuri is normally very calm, somewhat aloof and competitive. The eldest of her sisters, she oversees and "parents" all of them to an extent. These qualities attracted Farru (FN FAL), another battle rifle who is much like Jiisuri in many ways, and the two share a close friendship and are often allied in school competitions. She is also fairly close with M14, another battle rile, and Funnco (FN FNC), an assault rifle and the main character of Upotte.

While Jiisuri is normally fairly calm and mature, she is a bit of a blushing housewife at heart, as revealed though her interactions with teachers at her school and with the manga's readers (Upotte's artist likes to add 4koma style strips at the end of certain chapters, where questions submitted by the readers are answered by the Upotte cast.) Jiisuri in her appearances is open, friendly, somewhat skittish and oddly flirtatious. She even poses for a personal, rather lewd personal photo shot as  part of a popularity poll.

Jiisuri is also one of the most popular Upottes; she won the first "Shounen ace Upotte popularity poll," trumping all the other characters.

Despite her skills in combat and the fine arts, Mian is intensely shy and doesn't reveal her face often; one of her hobbies includes "training to reveal her true smile."

title: stenciled_rose
body:
A highly stylized design where a [[rose]] is drawn [[no_lineart|without lines]], as if with stencils. Very frequently drawn in [[monochrome]].

Classically appears in images with (but is not usually attached to) [[vines]] and [[thorns]], or themes of evil/darkness. However, this is by no means always the case, as seen in post #2421593.

The stenciled rose differs from the [[mackintosh rose]] in that it usually depicts a matured bloom rather than a younger bud, features more space between wedges, and exhibits more variety and irregularity of shape amongst its pieces. 

Good examples of the stenciled rose can be found at post #2430001, post #2348562, post #2238712, and post #2229803.

Other examples can be found "all":http://theartofquilling.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/01/quilled-rose-stencil21.jpg "over":http://www.custombodyart.com/ABDTATA54w800.jpg "the":http://coloringpage.eu/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/rose-stencil.jpg "Internet":http://free-stencils.com/rose-stencils/free-printable-rose-stencil.png.

h4. See also
* [[mackintosh rose]]
* [[rose print]]
* [[dark persona]]

title: mega_salamence
body:
The Mega-Evolved form of #373 [[Salamence]], which debuted in [[Pokemon ORAS]]. Mega Evolution transforms Salamence into a Pokémon suited for almost all areas of combat, possessing an excellent balance of offense, defense and speed. The plating on its underbelly mutates into an armor-like vest that it can tuck its forelegs into, allowing for more aerodynamic flight, quite similar to [[Latios]]. Its body becomes narrower, its forelegs shorten somewhat, and the crest on its head now forms some sort of mouth guard. Most prominently, however, are Mega Salamence's enormous wings, which it can meld together to fly indefinitely.

Mega Salamence attains a huge boost to its Defense stat, a good buff to its Speed, and minor buffs to its Attack, Special Attack and Speed, resulting in a highly balanced stat spread. Its Ability, Aerilate, turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves, buffs their power by 30% and then applies STAB.

Previous Mega Evolution: #361 [[Mega Glalie]]
Next Mega Evolution: #376 [[Mega Metagross]]

title: mega_charizard_x
body:
One of two Mega-Evolved forms of [[Charizard]], which debuted in [[Pokemon XY]]. Charizard can attain this form when holding a Charizardite X. Mega Evolution enhances Charizard's physical capacities, granting it far more raw physical power and resilience than ever before. Its tail is somewhat shorter, its body turns jet-black with blue details, and its wings transform to attain a different shape.

Its Attack rises prominently over the course of Mega Evolution, and its Defense and Special Attack increase noticeably as well. Its Ability, Tough Claws, grants Mega Charizard X a 33% boost to contact moves. This form is also a Fire/Dragon-type, rendering it vulnerable to Ground-type moves and stage hazards.

Its counterpart is [[Mega Charizard Y]].

title: mega_charizard_y
body:
One of two Mega-Evolved forms of [[Charizard]], which debuted in [[Pokemon XY]]. Charizard can attain this form when holding a Charizardite Y. Mega Evolution grants it a more streamlined physique with wing-like protrusions on its arms, a far longer tail, a crown-like crest adorning its head and much larger wings that greatly enhance its already amazing flight capabilities.

Its Special Attack rises drastically over the course of Mega Evolution, and it also has increased Attack and Special Defense. Its Ability, Drought, summons harsh sunlight for 5 turns, further bolstering Mega Charizard Y's Fire-type moves.

Its counterpart is [[Mega Charizard X]].

title: eli_(annie_mei_project)
body:
From [[Annie Mei Project]]

h5. Character profile

Age: 17
Very protective of Annie, gets along with Megan surprisingly well, secretly intimidated by May Gunn and Rei, and can’t handle how openly in love Annie’s parents always are with each other.

+formidable +reserved +loving
-destructive -rigid -proud

h5. Likes

👍doing the right thing 👍sports 👍friends

h5. Dislikes

👎being left out 👎losing his temper 👎overwhelming personalities

title: retro_mei
body:
From [[Annie Mei Project]]

h5. Character profile

Age: mid to late 20s
LOVES her friends, appreciates Annie’s enthusiasm and determination, bit of a big sister to the twins, enjoys how easy it is to tease Eli, and is over Xii (or so she says).

+confident +honest +intimate
-rash -proud -self serving

h5. Likes

👍indulging 👍getting attention 👍freedom

h5. Dislikes

👎liars 👎weakness 👎boring people

title: hudson_(annie_mei_project)
body:
From [[Annie Mei Project]]

h5. Character profile

Age: ~22
Old friends with Annie, is into May Gunn, thinks Eli is pretty cool, admires Rei, and gets along really well with Annie’s parents.

+sympathetic +engaging +artistic
-aloof -lacking depth -stubborn

h5. Likes

👍baking 👍dogs 👍May Gunn

h5. Dislikes

👎spicy foods 👎feeling useless 👎making phone calls

title: may_gunn
body:
From [[Annie Mei Project]]

h5. Character profile

Age: 19-21

Tells everyone her name is May Gunn because she thinks its cooler than ‘Megan’, both admires and envies her twin, is incredibly competitive with Annie, is inspired by Rei, despises Xii for being so good, and has an obvious crush on Hudson.

+playful +determined +independent
-overbearing -unpredictable -careless

h5. Likes

👍being the best (or just better than Annie) 👍being strong 👍Hudson

h5. Dislikes

👎losing to Annie or Xii 👎insecurity 👎being bored

title: megan_(annie_mei_project)
body:
From [[Annie Mei Project]]

h5. Character profile

Age: 19-21
Drawn to Annie’s personality, gets along well with her [[twins|twin]] May Gunn, holds Rei and Xii in high regard for their skills, feels comfortable around tall friends like Eli.

+dignified +compassionate +intelligent
-calculated -sensitive -dependent

h5. Likes

👍Annie 👍food 👍disguises (especially ones where she gets to wear a mustache)

h5. Dislikes

👎flith 👎messes 👎forgetting things

title: tsurikichi_sanpei
body:
A 1970s~80s [[fishing]] manga series about a young fishing enthusiast by [[Yaguchi Takao]].
It was adapted into an 1980~1982 anime series, a 2001 OVA and a 2009 live action film.
A sequel manga series, titled "Tsurikichi Sanpei: Heisei-ban", started in 2001.

title: amaginomiya_tokuko
body:
A [[Touhou]] [[original]] character from [[Heavenly Gathering of Clouds]]. [[Amaginomiya Akiko]] is her younger half-sister.
She is modeled after [[Emperor Antoku]]. In the story the Amaginomiya sisters once lost their [[sword_of_kusanagi|regalia sword]].
